title: Strengthening Organizational Development Practical Competencies: VR-Based Expert Empathy Training Program

context.prior_knowledge: Core competencies for professional fields (medical/legal/technical) and basic digital device usage skills
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can understand various social contexts and perform empathic responses with over 80% accuracy through VR simulations
Learners can analyze five or more conflict scenarios that may arise in professional settings and propose empathic resolution strategies
Learners can explain changes in their empathic abilities through three or more behavioral indicators via reflective journaling after VR experiences

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
